name: 8.24 "Mr. Otis Regrets" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 8 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What reason did Frasier say Lilith wanted to sing?
questions.correct: So she could sing a lullaby to Frederick without scaring him
options: She liked the sound of her voice
Frasier had requested that she sing more often
So Frederick would learn good music
questions.explanation:
So she could sing a lullaby to Frederick without scaring him.

	Bebe Neuwirth who played Lilith had a beautiful voice. She had been in several Broadway musicals including "Sweet Charity", "Damn Yankees" and "Chicago".

Terry.

	Terry was played by Christine Cavanaugh. She was born August 16, 1963 in Utah in the United States of America.

questions.text: How long had Kelly and Woody been dating as of this episode?
questions.explanation:
over a year.

	Woody was looking for a roommate and thought Terry would be perfect. However, one of the gang thought it would be a problem with Kelly. Woody said if he wasn't sleeping with Kelly, why would Kelly think he's sleeping with someone else. Shocked someone asked, "wait a minute, you've been going with Kelly for over a year and you're still not sleeping with her?" Woody and Kelly wanted to wait until they were married to have sex.

questions.text: Who did Sam compare himself to?
questions.explanation:
Mother Teresa.

	Sam was going to a dinner party for Rebecca to spy on Robin's other girlfriend, Jean-Marie. Sam said it was like he was doing something for a "higher person, like that old nun, what's that babes name". Someone suggested he met Mother Teresa and he said yes.

questions.correct: The pipes burst and the dinner party was canceled.
options: He got sidetracked by another beautiful woman.
She was busy with all her boyfriends.
There was a fire and the building burnt down.
questions.explanation:
The pipes burst and the dinner party was canceled.

	However, Sam told Rebecca that he did meet Jean-Marie. Not only did he say he met her, he said he had sex with her.

questions.text: Where did Sam tell Rebecca he had sex with Jean-Marie?
questions.explanation:
elevator.

	He lied to Rebecca in hopes of having sex with her. He figured she'd be so desperate to be as good as Jean-Marie for Robin, that she'd do anything.

Liza Minnelli.

	Liza Minnelli is Judy Garland's daughter. Like her mother, she is a singer and has appeared in musicals. Frasier was making fun of Lilith when he called her Liza Minnelli.

options: Can't Help Lovin' Dat Man of Mine
questions.explanation:
Sonny Boy.

	"Sonny Boy" was a song made famous by Al Jolsen. She did sing "My Funny Valentine" but in another episode. If you recognized "All that Jazz" Bebe Neuwirth who played Lilith sang that in "Chicago" on Broadway.

questions.text: How much did Sam give the kid to walk up to the penthouse?
questions.explanation:
$5.

	The penthouse was 40 floors from where they were so the kid was not happy. He went and got the security guard to tell him that Sam kicked him off the elevator.

questions.text: Why did Rebecca leave Sam in the elevator mostly undressed?
options: She got a call from Robin.
questions.explanation:
She knew he was lying.

	The water break was in the newspaper so she knew Sam never met Jean-Marie. To get back at him she tied him in the elevator and left him there with his pants off and his shirt undone.
